publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-992 Helen Eadie: NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project-That the Parliament congratulates NHS Fife and NHS Tayside on their successful skin cancer awareness project "Keep Yer Shirt On", designed to raise the awareness in children of the need to protect skin from ultraviolet (UV) light and, in particular, welcomes their partnership with the relevant councils to encourage pre-school establishments to adopt sun awareness policies which include the prevention of future cases of skin cancer through the continued education of young people on the risks of exposure to UV light.
S2M-992 NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Marlyn Glen*

S2M-992*#* Helen Eadie: NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project-That the Parliament congratulates NHS Fife and NHS Tayside on their successful skin cancer awareness project "Keep Yer Shirt On", designed to raise the awareness in children of the need to protect skin from ultraviolet (UV) light and, in particular, welcomes their partnership with the relevant councils to encourage pre-school establishments to adopt sun awareness policies which include the prevention of future cases of skin cancer through the continued education of young people on the risks of exposure to UV light. Supported by: Marlyn Glen, Elaine Smith*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Fiona Hyslop*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*, Frances Curran*

S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Chris Ballance*, Dr Jean Turner*, Scott Barrie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Rhona Brankin*, Karen Whitefield*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine May*
S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-992# NHS Fife and NHS Tayside "Keep Yer Shirt On" Project (lodged on 3 March 2004) Trish Godman*
